JISA.VISA

Class VISA

  • java.lang.Object
    • JISA.VISA.VISA

  • public class VISA
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class for accessing the native VISA library in a more Java-friendly way

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VISA()

      Returns the value of the given VISA Attribute for the given instrument

        Returns an array of all instrument addressed detected by VISA

        Array of instrument addresses
        Throws:

                           throws VISAException

        Returns:
        Instrument handle
        Throws:

                         java.lang.String toWrite)
                  throws VISAException
        Writes to the given instrument, specified by instrument handle returned by openInstrument()
        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument handle from openInstrument()
        toWrite - String the write to the instrument
        Throws:
        VISAException - Upon error with VISA interface

      • read

                                    int bufferSize)
                             throws VISAException
        Read from the given instrument, specified by instrument handle returned by openInstrument()
        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument handle from openInstrument()
        bufferSize - Number of bytes to allocate for response
        Returns:
        The read string from the device
        Throws:
        VISAException - Upon error with VISA interface

                                long value)
                         throws VISAException

        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument handle from openInstrument()

        value - The value to give it

        VISAException - Upon error with VISA interface

        timeoutMSec - Timeout in milliseconds
